body:
Hi

It was September 8th and Eric and I were moved into a room with Sli (completely out of the blue) and we were just told that we were the new builders. It might've not seemed to special to other people but I was happy for myself, this was probably my best achievement on this server and without Eric I wouldn't have been able to do it and I really am thankful for him helping me to get to Builder. It was mid-December and again, out of the blue I got a promotion to mapdev which had been my dream ever since I started making maps on this server. It's the beginning of January my behaviour is changing and I'm starting to think about retiring from mapdev as other people are saying: "the server is trash" etc and myself at that time was drawn into that and I ended up retiring to fit in. 

To anyone wondering why I'm making this post, I feel as if I've been a d*ck by sh*tposting and being rude to people here in general. I would like to start a fresh and erase those weeks where I was an idiot.
I will try to be making maps for this server.

Sincerely 
Ryan

Sincerely 
Ryan

replies.body:
'guess ill unblock u on ts and discord i hope you will be normal once again.'
'Lol I thought he was ur best friend'
'its none of your business anyways is it'

First, if you're going to make a comment like the aforementioned one, then of course he's going to be curious. Moreover, you're assuming that Atdit and I are friends, and that is why I am 'trying to stand up for [my] friend'; this is not true. I'm pointing out that your answer was rather rude and there was absolutely no need to respond as you did.
